question: What is the growth rate of India according to the BMI Research report?
explanation: According to BMI Research, a Fitch group company, India is expected to register a growth of 6.9% in this financial year. The report has observed that the Real GDP growth has slowed to 6.1 % year-on-year in the fourth quarter of 2016-17. BMI Research was founded in 1984 by Business Monitor International and later in 2014, it was acquired by Fitch Group
